text: Hale and Hearty
This one moves like lightning, deftly evading enemy blows.
Unyielding
If you're tough enough, armor becomes mere decoration.
Plenty have tried—killing this one is no easy feat. Trust me.
Every movement comes effortlessly to this one.
You really don't want to be on the receiving end of their strikes. Really.
A true model of health and strength—clearly shaped by years of training.
Escape Artist
Dangerous Conduct
Well-Trained
Indomitable
Greed Incarnate
Stoic
To this one, personal feelings are never for public display.
Eagle-Eyed
This one doesn't just know the art of war—they embody it.
A lust for treasure to rival even the greenskinned!
If you want to live, keep your eyes open and your head down.
Master of Arms
Precision and order? This one is unmatched—just don’t invite them to a party.
Capable Governor
Many of Mingzhu City's towering spires are thanks to this one's tireless efforts.
Architect
Shrewd Trader
“Too late, too late.” By the time I’m gone, it’ll be your regret to bear.
Thankfully, there are always those who fret over the fate of the world—or we’d be… wait, never mind.
Tactical Advisor
“There’s always a way, always an angle—you just have to find it.”
This one is a paragon of talent—brilliance incarnate and the pride of the nation.
Meticulous Planner
Genius Beyond Compare
This one's martial might is unmatched—free to roam the battlefield, unstoppable.
Peerless
This one descends from the pureblood of the Dragon Children, closest of mortals to the power of the heavens.
Pureblood
